verbs.description: luke walton job ‘ not in danger’ [V: los] angeles [ARG0: lakers president] magic johnson may not be thrilled with how luke walton has the team playing but his job apparently is not on the line yet according to tania ganguli of the los angeles times it is true that johnson angrily met with his coach after a winless two - game road trip magic johnson los angeles lakers los angeles times lakers luke walton tania ganguli los angeles
